chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: The regression test suite is build upon Apache JMeter, that simplifies test scenario creation and modification a lot. Get the JMeter 2.1.1 binary and unpack it to directory of your choice.

The JMeter test drivers (*.jmx) are shipped with the JBossWS source distribution and are located in the test directory:
test/resources/benchmark/jmeter/
